employeeTable.tableDesc: Overview of all registered employees in your organization.

tableDataActions.tableDataDesc: Insert table data according to the selected date. The changes you make will affect all charts.

warningsAndErrors.noDatEntryToUpdate: There is no data entry to update on the date you selected.
warningsAndErrors.noDataEntryToDelete: There is already no data entry on the date you selected.
warningsAndErrors.willBeDeletedConfirm: Statistics for employees on the selected date will be deleted. Do you accept?
warningsAndErrors.alreadyHaveData: There is already a data entry for this date. You can delete and update the data for this date.
warningsAndErrors.youMustAddLeastOneEmployee: To add a data entry to the selected date, you must add at least one employee.
warningsAndErrors.alreadyHaveEmployeeSameName: There is already an employee with the same name. Please check and try again.
warningsAndErrors.requiredField: The {{field}} field is a required field.
warningsAndErrors.requiredAndMinCharField: The {{field}} field is a required field and must be at least {{min}} characters.
warningsAndErrors.lastEmployeeConfirm: This is your last employee, if you delete all your employees all existing charts will be reset. Do you accept?

forgotPasswordPage.pageDesc: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
